title: 菊花賞の後に・敗北を越え、次の憧れへ

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Haaah...
I couldn't do it~...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Next time, maybe.
Yeah, next time, next time I'll win for sure!

As I walked down the underground path to pick up Matikanetannhauser...
I could hear faint voices talking.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: --I just really wanted to say thank you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Today, I was really able to give it my all!
I could challenge as the number one...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
That's... I think it's thanks to
Bourbon-san, after all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
So... so...
Thank you...!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...I feel the same way.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
To escape from you chasing me,
I've become several times stronger than before.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Let's do our best in the senior class too.

The two, who praised each other,
headed back to the waiting room together.
As I watched their backs--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, I thought I could do it, you know.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yes. But I saw my challenges again, and I realized
I can fight pretty well in long-distance big races too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So...
I have a little proposal--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
After the Classic Triple Crown ended, I was thinking
about what I want to challenge next.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Do you remember what the chairman said
during the summer training camp?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Things like 'I'm not drawn to your record' or
'It's precisely because you're ordinary that you're charming'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It makes me really happy, but honestly,
there are parts I can't quite accept? You know.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because, normally, the kind of person who can push you forward is strong, cool, and sparkling, right?
choice_data_list: That might be the general idea.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm happy about the expectations and want to live up to them, but the more I think about it, the less I know how to do it~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, for now, I think I'll just go in the direction my heart desires!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And the one that really got me going was, straight up, the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)'...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I know, it won't be easy! It's a 3200m G1 long-distance race, the one that decides the strongest stayer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The tactics are sure to be way more difficult, and my stamina probably still isn't enough.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But still, winning on that big stage in spring... it's something to aspire to, right...!
As usual, she's probably unaware of it herself, but it's a very positive opinion.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, not exactly as a prep race for that, but I want to fit in one long-distance race before spring.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: For example, the 3400m 'Diamond Stakes' or something like that!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...What do you think?
There's no particular reason to refuse. In fact, if it's her wish, I want to grant it as much as possible. So—
choice_data_list: Got it, let's go for the 'Diamond S' next.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, this time for sure. I'll do my best... I'll do my best!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Wow, that was a great race. Bourbon and the others, of course... and Matikanetannhauser too!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser, is that that girl?

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: Yes. She was a bit of a topic after the 'Japanese Derby'! She has a positive and friendly personality.

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: She doesn't have overwhelming talent or anything, but she's a strong girl who doesn't give up and keeps trying.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Doesn't give up and keeps trying... I see.

text_block_list.name: Glasses-Wearing Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Um, excuse me!
Could I interview you a bit about those feelings?

text_block_list.name: Glasses-Wearing Reporter
text_block_list.text: Especially about Matikanetannhauser-san!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, nice, nice.
Spread the word about Tannhauser's awesomeness~.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Those who see it, see it, you know?
...Just kidding.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's head back and run!
I'm gonna do my best too!
Even without a win, I quietly demonstrated my ability in the 'Kikuka Sho'.
Next up is the even longer-distance 'Diamond Stakes'!
